features: Improved Icons: Settings icon now appear in black and improved quality of toggle buttons in settings.
Reset option: Added option to reset the game, within the board page.
bug-fix: Menu button glitch: Fixed an issue where the "Resume" and "Start New Game" buttons appeared after selecting and deselecting a piece without making a move.
Button position flicker: Fixed an issue where the "Resume" and "New Game" buttons briefly appeared in the top-left corner before moving to their correct positions.
